com.hybris.services.entitlements.condition

Interface ActionHandlerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConditionStrategy, GeoConditionStrategy, MeteredConditionStrategy, PathConditionStrategy, StringConditionStrategy, TimeframeConditionStrategy

    public interface ActionHandlerFactory
    A factory to provide action-specific execution handlers for given condition type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActionHandler getActionHandler(String action)
      Get action handler.
      String getConditionType()
      Type of condition processed by the factory.
